help_lines.help0: 1. Tap over the area to modify
help_lines.help1: 2. You can move the area using tap and hold
help_lines.help3: 4. Tap Apply to save the effect
help_lines.help4: 5. Tap Save to export the picture

errors.image_crash: An error occurred while loading the last image. Should I load the picture in a smaller resolution?
errors.photo_permissions:
PrivacyBlur needs full access to your photos to function.
Go to the settings to grant the app your permission.
errors.problem_img_read:
Problem reading the image.
File does not exist?
errors.img_format:
Problem with the file format.
Is this an image?
errors.img_size:
Problems with the image size.
Try again.
errors.img_not_readable: Cannot read the image from the file.
errors.processing_image:
An exception occurred while processing the image.
Please try again.
errors.image_scale_down: Warning: the picture was scaled down. What you see is the final quality. Original resolution: {origRes}, new resolution: {newRes}

main_screen.content:
Hide sensitive data
from your pictures!
main_screen.photo_permissions: PrivacyBlur needs full access to your photos to function. Tap "Select from Library" to get started.
